items.text:
As you approach the threshold, you notice that nearly every reclaimer
in Spire is moving in your direction, funneling into the excavated
arcology entrance, then disappearing into the darkness below. Is
this what truly drew them to Spire? Something buried deep in the
arcology ruin? Regardless of their motivations, you decide that if they
want to claim the tunnels of the arcology, they can have them. Your
priorities lie on the surface.
